commit_list.repo_description: Setup and manage header bidding advertising partners without writing code or confusing line items. Prebid.js is open source and free.

commit_list.message: Add the NginAdAdapter and hooks
commit_list.repo_description: Setup and manage header bidding advertising partners without writing code or confusing line items. Prebid.js is open source and free.

commit_list.message: Fix MS Excel Report downloads

Let the private exchange admins(demand customers) view the exchange fees they are paying to use the dashboard.
This is a feature improvement.

Reverting erroneous commit. The private exchange domain admin must only see the cost of the impressions INCLUDING the ad exchange mark-up fees. Otherwise they would know the cost of the impressions from the SSP, and they wouldn't have the total amount they owe including the global exchange markup for their ad campaigns.

Fixed 2 small bugs. One is where the private exchange admin switches to their campaigns and insertion orders while still impersonate(LOGIN AS) a publisher. That will create a campaign with the publisher as the owner which is not allowed, and thus it's orphaned. The other bug that's fixed is that the private exchange admin(Demand Customer) was able to see the Super Admin or global exchange revenue and gross CPM in their PX demand tab in reports, which shouldn't be viewable by private exchange admins.
change SMTP default from mandrill to sendInBlue since Mandrill is gone.
Small change in the status.
Update the versions and Status.
Update the DB version for the new release

A bug was introduced in Release 1.6.10, which cast private_auction to "object" instead of "integer". This caused the PMP tasklet to fail on Private Exchange domain admins bidding on their own publishers' inventory. private_auction is now cast to integer before the JSON encoding fixing the tasklet as well in the workflow.
Update version for minor fix.
Syntax fix
Update version for minor fix.
Update version for minor fix.

Some Zend Framework author got overzealous with warnings.
 * See: https://github.com/zendframework/zend-mvc/issues/87
Remove bad directive
This directive is invalid on the default configuration.
Status update for a minor DSP OpenRTB 2.3 update release 1.6.10
Up the version for a minor DSP OpenRTB 2.3 update release.
Up the version on the DB for a minor DSP OpenRTB 2.3 update release.
Log file parser for the new DSP number match logs
Track DSP wins for numbers matching on new partners

I am not sure why the protocols were put on the user sync pixels for cookie tracking, but they definitely should not be there. The protocol should be auto-determined by the browser using the page context.

Replace the winning auction price with the OpenRTB Macro instead of our proprietary one to match the 2.3 spec. If you have an encryption method set with your partner, you will want to encrypt the value here before replacing it.

So far NginAd has only dealt with Ad Exchanges which were able to convert string types into the type they needed from the OpenRTB request and response. But herego we have encountered an ad exchange that absolutely requires the exact JSON data types from the OpenRTB 2.3 spec or else it throws a 500 internal server error with no error message or error code. And really, why should we not cater to this method of RTB communication as well(why not).
Update the configs and README.md and prepare for the minor version bug fix release.
Update the DB and prepare for the minor version bug fix release.
Bug fix for domain admin stats on their own publishers only
Release statement update about SQL changes
Adding SQL changes to the install script nginad-1.6.8.sql, and explicitly naming upgrade script from 1.6.7 to 1.6.8 as header-bidding-update.sql
Refactor the factory singleton instance get outside of the for loop.
Bug fix reported by user and fixed by Munish
Update the release notes.
Remove some junk string.
Small CSS update to give users more room to see the ad tag by default.
The auction type shouldn't be selectable if video is chosen for the ad zone.
Changed the NginAdAdapter ID from 22 to 23 since Prebid.js has Rubicon registered as 22.
Changed the nginad server domain to make it more obvious that it's only a placeholder string.
Fix some bugs while testing multiple ad zones from a single shared header bidding snippet
update the config to 1.6.8
Prepare the 1.6.8 database version. Note that this database has slight changes to the InsertionOrderLineItems from version 1.6.7
The domain for the scriptUrl used for the NginAd RTB header bid has to be dynamic since NginAd is used by people who white label it for their own Ad Exchange.
Increase the timeout to load the RTB responses slightly, and remove the callback handler for the ad unit load since we aren't using it currently.

Fix a small bug with height and width in the NginAd bidder response.
Delete the minified file since we did not minify the changes yet.

Cleaned up the debug messages in JS and added adUrl tracking for Pubmatic only so far since we don't know if there are others that put the tracker URL in adUrl. We know that AppNexus does not. They put the actual Ad HTML markup in the adUrl response, which is not loaded when we replace DFP with NginAd. We load the matched tag from the publisher dashboard instead.
Implement configurable caching for header bidding RTB responses as not to overload the server with mock RTB header bid requests.

A massive comment discussing possible header bidding implementations and why we chose mock bidding versus a token/match system. These comments will be crucial for those that want to change the bidding workflow.
Implement changes to the header bidding module.
Bug fix to WorkflowHelper.php
Fix IP Address assignments and tweak the OpenRTB Device object in the request to build the device from the Header Bid requester since they are running the auction from their browser with Javascript.
We need an actual no bid response, not a 204 HTTP code for our Javascript handler
Get rid of Fidelity comments in the copy over.
Add the Header Bidding Partner to the ZF config file.
Add a skeleton of the new mock bid module for Header Bidding request responses
Fix small bugs and prepare the module loader.
Add a skeleton of the NginAd Header Bidding Adapter
Fix some bugs in the bid loaders
Fix the PassbackAdTag functionality.

Bug fixes. Delete HeaderBiddingAdUnits no longer used, the second bug is to leave the passback and floor in case the header bid doesn't meet the floor or there is no winning header bid, you can use the passbackAdTag
HTML encode ampersand
Show header bidding invocation code.

Most of the header bidding MVC action processing code is done.
1. Update header bidding ad units without changing the DOM divIDs
2. Implement the delivery code which shows the winning ad tag from the ad exchange who won the header bidding auction for that zone
3. Fix bugs in the Ping Manager

TODO:
1. A bug remains where the first header bid ad tag is shown regardless of whether houseAds=true
2. Implement the AJAX light boxes to grab the header bid code for the ad zones. There will be 2 boxes. One for the header snippet (which tells the user only to paste it once for all zones under that header bid), and one for the divId ad zone snippet which the header snippet populates.

The rubicon header bid adapter is still broken, but the others seem to work.
Need to add the handler code to ad/nginad.js
Bug fix, incorrect DOM id.

Finished most of the work on the prebid auction in the header JS.
Next we need to set up the proxy loading of the winning tag via ad/nginad.js with the new hb_ header bid parameters in the query params when loading the nginad.js script.
set header id to null when RTB auction type is selected
Bug fixes and finish the user interface.
Adding the create/edit functionality for header bidding.
Adding quick scroll 2 new elements
completed the Javascript page logic
Add the SQL changes to the data model
Adding some of the logic to create header bidding templates.
Add the new header bidding and prebid.js initial code.
Fixed typo
Update the MOTD and the minor version
Update DB version to 1.6.7
Fixed an IAB category ID bug reported by a NginAd user recently.
Removed un-used factory objects.
Fixed some class name errors
Adding APC stats viewer, just in case you want to debug the in-memory statistics caching for the running instance.

Forgot to implement the global exchange-wide SSP and PMP disable flags in global.php
This would be used if you are using NginAd as a bidder only without hosting private exchanges.
Fix a bad reference to a missing class.
Skip the private exchange SSP and PMP selection checks for the demand customer test user installed with NginAd by default for testing purposes.
Standardize the way insert and update ids are returned in the line item filters
On the Fidelity SSP, send a 204 instead of a nbr response for no-bid.
Add a force update parameter to the CachedTableRead class so we can force a data refresh from a cached call.
Fix a namespace that was mis-copy/pasted
Min and max video durations equal or greater/less than the times specified in the delivery filter are OK.
Check the app object as well as the site object for the verticals to compare the delivery filter vertical selections against (just in case it's a mobile app)
Refactor the bid request TLD, SSP logging metadata into a helper class and use the common method instead of copy pasting the parsing code everywhere.
The device object is recommended but not required by the OpenRTB spec, so set a default empty device object if it's not set in the request.
Validation checks plus update the nomenclature in the error messages from the old Campaign/Banner terms to the new InsertionOrder/InsertionOrderLineItem terminology.
Add defaults on the native request objects set by the parser from the IAB OpenRTB Native 1.0 documentation.
Re-add the frequency check set in the delivery filters for display. The frequency is per bid, not per impression and the frequency data stored in memory per instance via APC.
Update the path on the stats to the new path which allows you to git update the installation from /home/nginad at any time.

Add a new optional exchange-wide SSP private exchange selection bypass: for those using NginAd as a SSP bidder only, set ssp_channel_bypass to true.
Update the release version to 1.6.6 for this small bugs fix.
update composer phar archive
Update nginx configs with keep-alive
If the JSON OpenRTB request wasn't validated there's no response to build and send.
Duplicate keys in the routes config. Only the first one is ever used.
Since we have a fixed bottom footer, we need to make sure that any submit buttons clear the footer element when scrolled
css style fixes for bad hex codes.
css bug fixes.
css bug fix
Footer positioning style fix.

Change corresponding to the Confluence page update: https://nginad.atlassian.net/wiki/display/NGIN/Installing+NginAd+Ad+Server+Instance
Lets make it so we can git pull from master in /home instead of patching the files manually. We keep the .git and other files in the otherwise empty /home directory on the CentOS box.
If the devicetype is present take the one that's in the OpenRTB request, and stop the processing.
Min and max video durations equal to the length of the video are OK. Bug fix greater than or equal to and less than or equal to operators.
Hard format the date, just in case it's given with no leading zeros when run manually on the command line.
Hard format the date, just in case it's given with no leading zeros when run manually on the command line.
Bug fix update to 1.6.5
Fix bad class path
A bug fix for the strict standards warning: "Strict Standards: Only variables should be passed by reference". The end() method should only be passed a variable input.
Insertion Order Line Item type check fix against the objects in the OpenRTB request.

Bug fix, change the SSP chooser to select the app->id instead of the site->id in case it's a native app on an exchange such as Smaato, otherwise without a site object it would never match selections from the SSP chooser in the demand dashboard IO line item page.
extra line break
Adding util MySQL script to invoice private exchange admins monthly according to their usage and the exchange wide mark-up rate.
Some CSS/JS style changes.

Bug fix for adding PMP sites as a Super Admin. Currently Domain admin sites will be wrongly added as Platform Connection sites since the $is_local is never correctly set when logged in as a super admin.
Version update to 1.6.4 and status message update.
DB version update to 1.6.4
String escape bug fix.
Some Max impressions checking to bug fix for a customer reported SQL validation error

This is a commit just to update the link in the last comment. Apparently the user posted the comment twice in the Confluence doc, so the one referenced in the last commit log message was removed, and the first one he or she posted was truncated. Here is the newly referenced comment URL regarding the change: https://nginad.atlassian.net/wiki/display/NGIN/Installing+NginAd+Ad+Server+Instance?focusedCommentId=11763714#comment-11763714

This update is non-critical, and in response to a comment on the Confluence page listed below.
The DB schema already has a default value so it's not null ( `WentLiveDate` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00' )
but clearly some people are running some alternate DB or changning the schema or something.
Lets set a default in the code so they can't possibly screw it up.
REFERENCE: https://nginad.atlassian.net/wiki/display/NGIN/Installing+NginAd+Ad+Server+Instance?focusedCommentId=11763715#comment-11763715
Referencing a non-existent OpenRTB member from a prior implementation triggers a PHP NOTICE. Small annoying bug we need to get rid of in case notices are turned on.
Update the status for the 1.6.3 release.
Prepare for another minor version release as 2 more bugs are fixed. One is major.

Merge pull request #1 from kh0r/master

Set correct permissions on newly created directories

Major bug found by an ad network running NginAd. The preview versions of the SSP and Private Exchange and Platform Connection inventory for Insertion orders and Line Items was not being copied over to staging versions of the IO's at all. This will require another immediate minor release.
update status
Bug fix for a new bug found by a user. Windows requires an .xlsx extension to open the file after download. Windows 8 does not require this (mime type), but it could be a previous version of Windows.
Status update
Prepare an update to 1.6.2
A Critical Signup bug was found by a user. The wrong field was getting assigned a MySQL date
Better choice of words
update the status message to get ready for the minor release update
update the version # to get ready for the minor release update
Add the new SQL schema copy to get ready for the minor update
Added a bunch of APC locking mutexes to prevent corruption in memory for statistics.
Remove extra array vector
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/nginadfoundation/nginad
A lot of cached statistics bug fixes. Will trigger a minor release to 1.6
More comment fixes
Typo fix in the comments
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/nginadfoundation/nginad
Bug fix, wrong model object fixed.
Delete Thumbs.db
This was a note before the implementation that is no longer relevant.
Fixed README.md

Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/nginadfoundation/nginad

Conflicts:
	upload/module/DashboardManager/src/DashboardManager/Controller/ServicesController.php
Small bug fix on the label for= attribute on the zone create and edit views.
parent_id should never be 0 because a 0 parent_id automatically qualifies you for Platform Connection inventory
parent_id should never be 0 because a 0 parent_id automatically qualifies you for Platform Connection inventory
Update the license to NginAd Foundation
Comment out unused sample sell side DSP partners, so that first time installers don't get TCP hang messages.
Fix MS Excel Report downloads

Forgot to implement the global exchange-wide SSP and PMP disable flags in global.php
This would be used if you are using NginAd as a bidder only without hosting private exchanges.

commit_list.message: Refactor the bid request TLD, SSP logging metadata into a helper class and use the common method instead of copy pasting the parsing code everywhere.

commit_list.message: The device object is recommended but not required by the OpenRTB spec, so set a default empty device object if it's not set in the request.
commit_list.repo_description: NginAd Official. Open Source RTB Ad Network

commit_list.message: Validation checks plus update the nomenclature in the error messages from the old Campaign/Banner terms to the new InsertionOrder/InsertionOrderLineItem terminology.
commit_list.repo_description: NginAd Official. Open Source RTB Ad Network

commit_list.message: Add defaults on the native request objects set by the parser from the IAB OpenRTB Native 1.0 documentation.
commit_list.repo_description: NginAd Official. Open Source RTB Ad Network

commit_list.message: Re-add the frequency check set in the delivery filters for display. The frequency is per bid, not per impression and the frequency data stored in memory per instance via APC.
commit_list.repo_description: NginAd Official. Open Source RTB Ad Network

commit_list.message: Update the path on the stats to the new path which allows you to git update the installation from /home/nginad at any time.
commit_list.repo_description: NginAd Official. Open Source RTB Ad Network

commit_list.message:
Add a new optional exchange-wide SSP private exchange selection bypass: for those using NginAd as a SSP bidder only, set ssp_channel_bypass to true.
Update the release version to 1.6.6 for this small bugs fix.

commit_list.message:
Change corresponding to the Confluence page update: https://nginad.atlassian.net/wiki/display/NGIN/Installing+NginAd+Ad+Server+Instance
Lets make it so we can git pull from master in /home instead of patching the files manually. We keep the .git and other files in the otherwise empty /home directory on the CentOS box.

commit_list.message: This is a commit just to update the link in the last comment. Apparently the user posted the comment twice in the Confluence doc, so the one referenced in the last commit log message was removed, and the first one he or she posted was truncated. Here is the newly referenced comment URL regarding the change: https://nginad.atlassian.net/wiki/display/NGIN/Installing+NginAd+Ad+Server+Instance?focusedCommentId=11763714#comment-11763714
commit_list.repo_description: NginAd Official. Open Source RTB Ad Network

commit_list.message:
This update is non-critical, and in response to a comment on the Confluence page listed below.
The DB schema already has a default value so it's not null ( `WentLiveDate` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00' )
but clearly some people are running some alternate DB or changning the schema or something.
Lets set a default in the code so they can't possibly screw it up.
REFERENCE: https://nginad.atlassian.net/wiki/display/NGIN/Installing+NginAd+Ad+Server+Instance?focusedCommentId=11763715#comment-11763715
commit_list.repo_description: NginAd Official. Open Source RTB Ad Network

commit_list.message: Major bug found by an ad network running NginAd. The preview versions of the SSP and Private Exchange and Platform Connection inventory for Insertion orders and Line Items was not being copied over to staging versions of the IO's at all. This will require another immediate minor release.

repo_list.description: CT Player is a fork of jwplayer that loads VAST and VPAID ads. For documentation and support, please visit the CT Player Support Site:
NginAd Official. Open Source RTB Ad Network
Setup and manage header bidding advertising partners without writing code or confusing line items. Prebid.js is open source and free.
